TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Sirayacu, title = Sirayacu, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sirayacu} }

S.FORM: == kakiliman == Sirayacu西拉雅族 Sirayacu "Siraya a kamu, Siraya", Taywan a Yincumincu, tungusay nu natimulan a mincu, angangan maliwaliwah i Cya-nan a enal. Taywan nisulitan i likisiay "Formosan" han nu tau a pangangan "Formosan", zumaay teked nitiyunga u Sirayacu a tademaw. 19 . nilaculan 19 . 19 lasubu a micah zayhan u layak misawacu mialaw tu lala', zuma Siraya a tademaw haymaw pasawali mabulaw, malimad muengen i Pusung, Kalinkuan. kanahatu masetul nu layak, maliwan tu ku nu babalaki a salisin atu kamu, sinmung migingkiway pasasuma tu Pinpucu. ayza caay henay ka palatatenga'en nu Cowng-hwa-min-kow cung-yang cenbu, ayzaay tu a mihcaan mikawaw palekal pangangan, milunguc tu cenbu patatenga' u Yincumin kami asaan. Sirayacu u A-li-cu ku kakayzaan, iza aca ku "misalisin tu puduk a mincu" a ngangan, nika tatenga' Sirayacu caay ku misalisinay tu puduk, uyza u masikaz tu puduk mahiza icelangay a nanum nu tuas. kakayzaan a ngangan nu binacadan ",是"Siraya" (Raleigh Ferrel)認為是" A·阿德拉爾(Karl A. Adelaar)則認為"raya" Siraya "達悟" . "Sirayacu" uyni layak nisulitan kasumamadan mikilim ci Cang-yaw-cian i 1951 a mihcaan nisulitan tu "Pinpucu-se a ngangan pasasuazih tu nisulitan, u "Siraya" uyni pangiha aimi. Siraya nuyaanay a imin, migingkiway tu kamu ci bey-li-low "Raeigh Ferrel" nasa u "nuwalianay a tademaw" "labu nu buyu'ay a tademaw" "labuay a tademaw" natimulan kamu nu mipasubana'ay ci Ka-al.A. A-te-la-al nasa "raya" u talabuay a imi, sisa Sirayacu taneng micuyaku u "talabuay a tademaw", mipasubana'ay ci S-wan-su nasa Siraya nu Taywan layak a kamu "sepat ta-se" niyul a ngiha, mipasubana'ay ci Twan-hung-kun duduc pikuwan nu Lipun a ziday mipasubana'ay nikinsaan tu niciluan, nasa Sirayacu uyza u "tademaw" sanay a imi, mahiniay Taucu "Tau" "Tao,Tau". i Helan a zidayan nikinsaan tu tademaw, Sing-kang-se pakala tu 900 ku tademaw, Mu-cya-wan-se pakala tu 8,900 ku tademaw, Ma-tow-se pakala tu 1300 ku tademaw, Siyaw-lung-se ku sakatuuday a tademaw macapi tu 2000. Taywan nuwalian a Sirayacu "大滿人"(Taivoan), . 1829 a mihca malingatu, zuma a Sirayacu haymaw pasawali mabulaw, malimad mueneng i Kalingku nu Pusku, Pailasan, Pusung a Fanaw Lilong, Kakacawan, Singku, patizeng tu niyazu', Kow-ing-san, Wan-zen-pu, sin-kwang-aw, Pung-ce-cun a niyazu'an, uzuma satabakiay a niyazu', nika makay singku caay kalecad. patatenga' kaku mibuheci tu lalekalan a lala', sawalian mabulaw a tademaw sakatuuday makay Takaway, Pintung a Taulungcu "Tamancu" atu Makatawcu, Sirayacu caay kakatuud, tinaku kasumamadan tizaay a binacadan hatu nipangangan "Tamancu" "Taivoan" han, tahkalay a singku angangan nu Taulungcu a singku. singku misalisin tu puduk . Sirayacu a tademaw kakayzaan a singku angangan u ba-lin a singku, Sirayacu a tademaw palekal tu micidekay kasikaz tu puduk. misalisin tu puduk sakay Sirayacu mahizaay u tuas, u heni i puduk, linking, landaway kaysing, caykeng papazengan labu pazeng han ku nanum amisalisin tuynian a papazengan. sapisalisin a puduk izaw ku canacanan a pudukan, payluma' kasikaz tu masazuma a puduk, uzip nu puduk tungusay cayay kalecad ku tuas, u singanganay A-li a tuas nu katuuday a tuasan uzuma a nipagangan. labi a salisin atu demiad a la'dis . paymihcaan Sirayacu palekal tu labi a salisi, pasazumaen Ta-ney-to-se Tay-cu labi a salisin atu Ci-pey-swa-A-li-mu labi a salisinan lalangawan a kawaw. Tow-se-Tay-cu labi a salisin i paymihcaan katukuh 10 tu teben nu bulad palekal, uyni a salisin sakay binawlan a imian malecad tu nu zumaay Yincumin a lalikid atu nu layakay a pulecuhan nu kamisama, zuma misalisinay nu A-li-cu. nipatateng' nu cenbu . Taynan a kuwan cenbu i 2005 a mihcaan saayaw patatenga' tu Sirayacu nu "kuwan a nipanutekan a Yincumicu", 2010 a mihcaan kuwan kenis papulung han zikuz, Taynan cebu patatenga' u "Taynan nipatatenga' a Yincumicu". 2013 a mihcaan, Kalingku a kuwan pailasan a Yakuba mikilul tu a patatenga'. . Siryacu pinaaytu a mihcaan palekal pangangan, nika caay patatenga'en nu cenbu, sabeleng satu pahulic ku binawlan. 2011 a mihcaan 7 a bulad 21 a demiad Taypak talakaway sin-cen-yen paketun mapanukas ku nipahulican, tungusay mademec, caay pakahamhem ku binawlan lalid sa pahuing. . imahini sakakaay nu cenbu nipatatenga'an singangan tu Yincumincu, Taynan cenbu dada' patatenga'an u "nipatatenga'an nu cenbu a Yincumincu" atu Kalingku Pailasan nipatatenga'an nu yakuba syang-tin a Yincumincu". sin-cen-yen i 2020 a mihcaan maawasay masumad singangan tu Yincumincu hulic cunus tu Pinpu Yincumina pasasizuma, halhal tu paulicay maawas ku tulu nisulitan nu hulic a panukas singangan tu Yincumincu. angangan migingki tu nasulitan . Sirayacu pinaay tu a mihcaan mala layakay tu, mahaminaytu malawpes ku lalangawan, namahiza migingkiway tu Sirayacu amiida tu naayaway nipatizeng tu zumaay a nisulitan, angangan kasumamadan izaw ci Cen-ti "tung-ban-ci", Taywan pidebungan nu Helan a ziday nisupedan nu cenbu atu niciluan nu cwan-cyaw-s, atu nisulitan tu kakitizaan, sacidekay ni Hwang-su-cin a " ban-su liw-kaw" atu 67 a "ban-se-cay-hung-tu", yadah ku nisulitan itawya Sirayacu a nikauzip a kawaw, u kagingkiwan nu iluciluc tu nisubelidan a kasatiman siacaay a nisulitan tu naemekan. kining atu nisupedan a lalangawan 紀念與文化保存 sakay Sirayacu pisuped tu lalangawan saicelangan ci Su-ban-ce u kawaw i Taynan a kuwan cebu, ci Su-ban-ce pikawawan niza patizeng tu Taywan saayaway a kuwanan Yincumincu wiy-ye-huy "Taynan a kuwan Siraya Yincumincu mikawaway wiy-yenhuy".

== kakiliman == Sirayaco西拉雅族 Sirayaco "Siraya a kamo, Siraya", Taywan a Yincominco, tongosay no natimolan a minco, angangan maliwaliwah i Cya-nan a enal. Taywan nisolitan i likisiay "Formosan" han no tao a pangangan "Formosan", zomaay teked nitiyonga o Sirayaco a tademaw. 19 . nilacolan 19 . 19 lasobo a micah zayhan o layak misawaco mialaw to lala', zoma Siraya a tademaw haymaw pasawali mabolaw, malimad moengen i Posong, Kalinkoan. kanahato masetol no layak, maliwan to ko no babalaki a salisin ato kamo, sinmong migingkiway pasasoma to Pinpoco. ayza caay henay ka palatatenga'en no Cowng-hwa-min-kow cong-yang cenbo, ayzaay to a mihcaan mikawaw palekal pangangan, milongoc to cenbo patatenga' o Yincomin kami asaan. Sirayaco o A-li-co ko kakayzaan, iza aca ko "misalisin to podok a minco" a ngangan, nika tatenga' Sirayaco caay ko misalisinay to podok, oyza o masikaz to podok mahiza icelangay a nanom no toas. kakayzaan a ngangan no binacadan ",是"Siraya" (Raleigh Ferrel)認為是" A·阿德拉爾(Karl A. Adelaar)則認為"raya" Siraya "達悟" . "Sirayaco" oyni layak nisolitan kasomamadan mikilim ci Cang-yaw-cian i 1951 a mihcaan nisolitan to "Pinpoco-se a ngangan pasasoazih to nisolitan, o "Siraya" oyni pangiha aimi. Siraya noyaanay a imin, migingkiway to kamo ci bey-li-low "Raeigh Ferrel" nasa o "nowalianay a tademaw" "labo no boyo'ay a tademaw" "laboay a tademaw" natimolan kamo no mipasobana'ay ci Ka-al.A. A-te-la-al nasa "raya" o talaboay a imi, sisa Sirayaco taneng micoyako o "talaboay a tademaw", mipasobana'ay ci S-wan-so nasa Siraya no Taywan layak a kamo "sepat ta-se" niyol a ngiha, mipasobana'ay ci Twan-hong-kon dodoc pikowan no Lipon a ziday mipasobana'ay nikinsaan to niciloan, nasa Sirayaco oyza o "tademaw" sanay a imi, mahiniay Taoco "Tao" "Tao,Tao". i Helan a zidayan nikinsaan to tademaw, Sing-kang-se pakala to 900 ko tademaw, Mo-cya-wan-se pakala to 8,900 ko tademaw, Ma-tow-se pakala to 1300 ko tademaw, Siyaw-long-se ko sakatooday a tademaw macapi to 2000. Taywan nowalian a Sirayaco "大滿人"(Taivoan), . 1829 a mihca malingato, zoma a Sirayaco haymaw pasawali mabolaw, malimad moeneng i Kalingko no Posko, Pailasan, Posong a Fanaw Lilong, Kakacawan, Singko, patizeng to niyazo', Kow-ing-san, Wan-zen-po, sin-kwang-aw, Pong-ce-con a niyazo'an, ozoma satabakiay a niyazo', nika makay singko caay kalecad. patatenga' kako miboheci to lalekalan a lala', sawalian mabolaw a tademaw sakatooday makay Takaway, Pintong a Taolongco "Tamanco" ato Makatawco, Sirayaco caay kakatood, tinako kasomamadan tizaay a binacadan hato nipangangan "Tamanco" "Taivoan" han, tahkalay a singko angangan no Taolongco a singko. singko misalisin to podok . Sirayaco a tademaw kakayzaan a singko angangan o ba-lin a singko, Sirayaco a tademaw palekal to micidekay kasikaz to podok. misalisin to podok sakay Sirayaco mahizaay o toas, o heni i podok, linking, landaway kaysing, caykeng papazengan labo pazeng han ko nanom amisalisin toynian a papazengan. sapisalisin a podok izaw ko canacanan a podokan, payloma' kasikaz to masazoma a podok, ozip no podok tongosay cayay kalecad ko toas, o singanganay A-li a toas no katooday a toasan ozoma a nipagangan. labi a salisin ato demiad a la'dis . paymihcaan Sirayaco palekal to labi a salisi, pasazomaen Ta-ney-to-se Tay-co labi a salisin ato Ci-pey-swa-A-li-mo labi a salisinan lalangawan a kawaw. Tow-se-Tay-co labi a salisin i paymihcaan katokoh 10 to teben no bolad palekal, oyni a salisin sakay binawlan a imian malecad to no zomaay Yincomin a lalikid ato no layakay a polecohan no kamisama, zoma misalisinay no A-li-co. nipatateng' no cenbo . Taynan a kowan cenbo i 2005 a mihcaan saayaw patatenga' to Sirayaco no "kowan a nipanotekan a Yincomico", 2010 a mihcaan kowan kenis papolong han zikoz, Taynan cebo patatenga' o "Taynan nipatatenga' a Yincomico". 2013 a mihcaan, Kalingko a kowan pailasan a Yakoba mikilol to a patatenga'. . Siryaco pinaayto a mihcaan palekal pangangan, nika caay patatenga'en no cenbo, sabeleng sato paholic ko binawlan. 2011 a mihcaan 7 a bolad 21 a demiad Taypak talakaway sin-cen-yen paketon mapanokas ko nipaholican, tongosay mademec, caay pakahamhem ko binawlan lalid sa pahoing. . imahini sakakaay no cenbo nipatatenga'an singangan to Yincominco, Taynan cenbo dada' patatenga'an o "nipatatenga'an no cenbo a Yincominco" ato Kalingko Pailasan nipatatenga'an no yakoba syang-tin a Yincominco". sin-cen-yen i 2020 a mihcaan maawasay masomad singangan to Yincominco holic conos to Pinpo Yincomina pasasizoma, halhal to paolicay maawas ko tolo nisolitan no holic a panokas singangan to Yincominco. angangan migingki to nasolitan . Sirayaco pinaay to a mihcaan mala layakay to, mahaminayto malawpes ko lalangawan, namahiza migingkiway to Sirayaco amiida to naayaway nipatizeng to zomaay a nisolitan, angangan kasomamadan izaw ci Cen-ti "tong-ban-ci", Taywan pidebongan no Helan a ziday nisopedan no cenbo ato niciloan no cwan-cyaw-s, ato nisolitan to kakitizaan, sacidekay ni Hwang-so-cin a " ban-so liw-kaw" ato 67 a "ban-se-cay-hong-to", yadah ko nisolitan itawya Sirayaco a nikaozip a kawaw, o kagingkiwan no ilociloc to nisobelidan a kasatiman siacaay a nisolitan to naemekan. kining ato nisopedan a lalangawan 紀念與文化保存 sakay Sirayaco pisoped to lalangawan saicelangan ci So-ban-ce o kawaw i Taynan a kowan cebo, ci So-ban-ce pikawawan niza patizeng to Taywan saayaway a kowanan Yincominco wiy-ye-hoy "Taynan a kowan Siraya Yincominco mikawaway wiy-yenhoy".
